summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing acceptance of an agreement with the State Department of Ecology and other agencies for all or part of the costs for sampling and testing of Terminal 5 soil from Midway Landfill and Jefferson Park Golf Course; making reimbursement appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating Fund and the Emergency Fund and appropriations from the Solid Waste and Park and Recreation Funds and declaring an emergency therefor.
